channel.title: [Req] On changing the description for teleports (dodian)
channel.description: Uhh, yeah. I'm using a dodian source.....I really need help on changing the description for teleports. It's easy to change the ones already put in :P Well, i mean like windstrike, How will I change the name? I tried putting it in, but it is kinda f**ked up. Help please.

item.title: [Req] On changing the description for teleports (dodian)
item.dc:creator: @justin95123 justin95123
item.description:
@justin95123 wrote:

goodboi1112:

ok you want to change the portals name if soo its client side

ROFL.
no
it is not clientside, it’s server side, i know you can do it… im not a java noob.
I know how simple the question is but it still isn’t working, i did everything tbh.
Same with adding objects, it worked b4.
but now it doesn’t[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 12:00:01 PM[/size][hr][quote=“MicroZoft, post:5, topic:196722”]you need to find the last four digits like this

sendQuest("Home Teleport", 13037); sendQuest("Teleport back home", 13038);
you need to find the 13038 of the spell and the 13037 of the spell[/quote]
aiiite thx
REP++

Read full topic

you need to find the last four digits like this

sendQuest("Home Teleport", 13037); sendQuest("Teleport back home", 13038);
you need to find the 13038 of the spell and the 13037 of the spell
